EssentialAsset.title: Essential asset
EssentialAsset.description: Information about the asset used for the provision of public services.

significance.title: Significado
significance.description: Estimated percentage share of the essential asset provided in relation to the overall asset needed for the provision of the public services.

predominance.title: Predominancia
predominance.description: Estimated percentage share of asset provided compared to asset used for activities other than the public services.
